entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with light wet snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 early this evening then becoming east 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with light wet snow early in the morning. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
